The Humanitarian OpenStreetMaps Team (HOT)Â have built a tool, inÂ conjunctionÂ with the US Civil Air Patrol and FEMA to help coordinate FEMAâs post-disaster response by asking you to help classify building damage in disaster-affected areas. link-text: Spend a few minutes clicking and help FEMA coordinate disaster response
